articles.author: Helen Livingstone, Léonie Chao-Fong, Miranda Bryant, Lorenzo Tondo, Katy Fallon, Dan Milmo, Julian Borger, Pjotr Sauer, Martin Farrer
articles.title: Russia-Ukraine war latest news: Arms shipments to Ukraine ‘legitimate targets’, says Moscow, as Zelenskiy calls for ceasefire – live - The Guardian
articles.description: Western shipments of arms to Ukraine could be attacked by the Russian military, Moscow warns, as European leaders call for a halt to the fighting

articles.title: Ukraine at 'turning point,' Zelenskiy says as Russians regroup near Kyiv - Rappler
articles.description: European Union leaders meeting in France said they were ready to impose harsher economic sanctions on Russia and might give Ukraine more funds for arms, but they rejected Ukraine's request to join the bloc
articles.content: LVIV, Ukraine  Ukraine was at a turning point in the war with Russian forces appearing to be regroup for a possible assault on Kyiv, President Volodymyr Zelenskiy said, as the United States imposed n… [+5835 chars]

articles.author: Alex Druce
articles.title: Investors jump ahead of war-torn weekend - news.com.au
articles.description: The Australian sharemarket eased into the weekend as investors took risk off the table with one eye on the rolling conflict in Eastern Europe.
articles.content: The Australian sharemarket sagged into the weekend as hopes of a ceasefire between Russia and Ukraine faded and central banks continued to wrestle with mounting inflationary pressures.The Australian … [+4768 chars]
